title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 106 - Payroll Deductions From Salaries Of State Employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 106 - Payroll Deductions From Salaries Of State Employees

State Regulations
§ 106.1 - Repealed
§ 106.2 - Payroll deductions for the purchase of united states bonds
§ 106.3 - Payroll deductions for payments to credit unions
§ 106.4 - Payroll deductions for contributions to campus-related foundations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 106

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §§8, 201

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
